name: Hungry Fish World: Fishy Polly
description:
Welcome to the Hungry Fish World, Fishy Polly

Feed your fishy characters and grow them big : eat the smaller and grow bigger!
Watch out for the enemy, you have to hide & manage skillfully so that the enemy will run into bigger fishes or upgrade your level to chase back your enemy.
The higher your level is, the more enemies you have.
Explore the food chain and learn about the nature of survival: eat the smaller and eat them all, quick!

Collect coins, hatch eggs, and upgrade /decorate your fish tank in the new Fishy Polly amazing adventure!

***Features:
- 30+ Fishy Polly character to select!
- Collect coin and hatch new fish
- Decorate your tank with beautiful background!
- More eggs, tank background
- Keep your checkpoint
- Daily task
- Feed your fish
- Fishes Decor

Remember these when you are playing:
- It's crazy hard to keep the pace while avoid the biggers
- Try to swim down to the darkest depth of the ocean!
- Avoid Bigger Fish, for sure

Remain calm & stay alive. Let's enjoy Fishy Polly.
